# Logical operations

This folder contains extensions that help with logical functions, conversions, comparisons, etc.

## Compare


**<u>Description</u>**: This NLP extension allows you to compare two values and return the result.

**<u>How to Use</u>**:
1. Write a step: `Compare ("input1","input2")`.
2. This compares the values and returns a **Pass** or **Fail** result.




### Details
- **Description:** Compares 2 values and returns a pass or fail result
- **Inputs:** a,b
- **Resources:** 
- **Async:** false
- [Add to Production (Europe)](https://app.virtuoso.qa/#/add-language-extension?name=Compare&org=true&%3D)
- [Add to Production (US)](https://app-us.virtuoso.qa/#/add-language-extension?name=Compare&org=true&%3D)
- [Add to Free trial](https://app2.virtuoso.qa/#/add-language-extension?name=Compare&org=true&%3D)
## Join


**<u>Description</u>**: This extension allows you to join multiple inputs to create a single string.
**<u>How to Use</u>**:
1. Write a step:` Join ("<input>","<input>") returning $result`.
2. **<u>Note</u>**: If you want spaces, include either as a separate input or together with one of the strings e.g. `Join("Bob ","Smith") returning $name` e.g. Bob Smith.
3. You can also pass in variables e.g. $var1, $var2.




### Details
- **Description:** Allows you to join together different inputs to create a single string
- **Inputs:** input1,input2
- **Resources:** 
- **Async:** false
- [Add to Production (Europe)](https://app.virtuoso.qa/#/add-language-extension?name=Join&org=true&%3D)
- [Add to Production (US)](https://app-us.virtuoso.qa/#/add-language-extension?name=Join&org=true&%3D)
- [Add to Free trial](https://app2.virtuoso.qa/#/add-language-extension?name=Join&org=true&%3D)
## Lowercase


**<u>Description</u>**: This extension converts a given input to lower case.
**<u>How to Use</u>**:
1. Write a step: `lowercase(input) returning $var`.
2. Here, **input** can be either a value e.g. "JAMES" or a stored variable e.g. $email.




### Details
- **Description:** This extension converts a given input to lower case e.g
- **Inputs:** texttoconvert
- **Resources:** 
- **Async:** false
- [Add to Production (Europe)](https://app.virtuoso.qa/#/add-language-extension?name=Lowercase&org=true&)
- [Add to Production (US)](https://app-us.virtuoso.qa/#/add-language-extension?name=Lowercase&org=true&)
- [Add to Free trial](https://app2.virtuoso.qa/#/add-language-extension?name=Lowercase&org=true&)
## Replace


**<u>Description</u>**: This extension allows you to join multiple inputs to create a single string.

**<u>How to Use</u>**:
1. Write a step: `Replace (string, stringToReplace, newString) returning $result`.
2. e.g. `Replace ("Silly Roger", "Silly", "Jolly") returning $result` -> output here is **Jolly Roger**.
3. You can also pass in variables e.g. $var1, $var2.
4. If you want to replace with blank text, put "" as your third parameter e.g. `Replace("400.00",".00","") returning $result`.



### Details
- **Description:** Replace specified text in an inputted string
- **Inputs:** string,replace,replacewith
- **Resources:** 
- **Async:** false
- [Add to Production (Europe)](https://app.virtuoso.qa/#/add-language-extension?name=Replace&org=true&%3D)
- [Add to Production (US)](https://app-us.virtuoso.qa/#/add-language-extension?name=Replace&org=true&%3D)
- [Add to Free trial](https://app2.virtuoso.qa/#/add-language-extension?name=Replace&org=true&%3D)
